title: zestVI
author: zestVI
content: ...and posts them on another website automatically and on facebook. pm me with price, i have web template and hosting and all that just need the bot. payment in crypto and escrow only.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: zestVI on October 27, 2022, 05:26:22 PM...and posts them on another website automatically and on facebook. pm me with price, i have web template and hosting and all that just need the bot. payment in crypto and escrow only.Contact forum AI AKA LoyceV :-P

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 27, 2022, 08:21:05 PMQuote from: zestVI on October 27, 2022, 05:26:22 PM...and posts them on another website automatically and on facebook. pm me with price, i have web template and hosting and all that just need the bot. payment in crypto and escrow only.Contact forum AI AKA LoyceV :-Pcopy/paste job, I doubt that Loyce will want to engage in plagiarism.OP, I think it's better for you to look for a ready-made solution and possibly adapt a little to it, it will surely be cheaper for you. for similar things, you have a good selection of WP plugins, but I'm not sure how long bot auto-posting can work on FB.

comments.author: zestVI
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 27, 2022, 09:15:25 PMQuote from: Royse777 on October 27, 2022, 08:21:05 PMQuote from: zestVI on October 27, 2022, 05:26:22 PM...and posts them on another website automatically and on facebook. pm me with price, i have web template and hosting and all that just need the bot. payment in crypto and escrow only.Contact forum AI AKA LoyceV :-Pcopy/paste job, I doubt that Loyce will want to engage in plagiarism.OP, I think it's better for you to look for a ready-made solution and possibly adapt a little to it, it will surely be cheaper for you. for similar things, you have a good selection of WP plugins, but I'm not sure how long bot auto-posting can work on FB. its not plagairism im only trying to get multiple articles on 1 website

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 27, 2022, 09:15:25 PMcopy/paste job, I doubt that Loyce will want to engage in plagiarism.Scrapping is of course copy/paste job. It requires a bot which LoyceV, TryNinja, BPIP are doing. The OP is asking for such service as per my knowledge. Quote from: examplens on October 27, 2022, 09:15:25 PMOP, I think it's better for you to look for a ready-made solution and possibly adapt a little to it, it will surely be cheaper for you. for similar things, you have a good selection of WP plugins, but I'm not sure how long bot auto-posting can work on FB. I too is not familiar with Facebook but for wordpress website there are many plugins which can scrap posts from another website and post automatically on a blog site. For Casino Critique we were planning such plugins for automatic news update for different sports but later removed it because this can eventually be penalized by search engine. Although we can disable the bot from robots.txt. We may consider such features later.

comments.author: zestVI
comments.body: ready made solutions have lots of problems literally going through the another script right now its full of errors..i need a custom one

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Each website has its own scripts, formatting, ads, and may even change that from time to time. This means that the scrapper will need to "know" each website's specifics.Then, as said, copying articles is very close to plagiarism. Even if OP will post on his website the original source/link, various websites and article writers will not be happy about that (some even prohibit it directly), since they lose revenue because of this kind of actions.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: zestVI on October 31, 2022, 12:55:21 PMready made solutions have lots of problems literally going through the another script right now its full of errors..i need a custom oneMaybe i can help you with this.You could use an RSS feed to take the articles from other sites and post them on your site, but this would be more a plugin solution than a script solution. I'm not sure if you are using Wordpress, PHP, or JS for this, but if you want just send me your telegram user name on PM and lets have a talk about it. The part about posting on Facebook is simple with RSS too... So, let's see if i can i help you.

I'm not sure if you are using Wordpress, PHP, or JS for this, but if you want just send me your telegram user name on PM and lets have a talk about it. The part about posting on Facebook is simple with RSS too... So, let's see if i can i help you.dont the website im taking this from need to have rss enabled too?
